definition: (baseball) an out that advances the base runners, kill or destroy
details:
noun
- (baseball) an out that advances the base runners
- the act of losing or surrendering something as a penalty for a mistake or fault or failure to perform etc.
= synonyms: forfeit, forfeiture
- the act of killing (an animal or person) in order to propitiate a deity
= synonyms: ritual killing
- personnel that are sacrificed (e.g., surrendered or lost in order to gain an objective)
- a loss entailed by giving up or selling something at less than its value
= example: a loss entailed by giving up or selling something at less than its value
verb
- kill or destroy
= example: kill or destroy
- make a sacrifice of
- endure the loss of
= synonyms: give
- sell at a loss
